CustomField.description: [EBH] (US-0040) : To have a link to SD for a Seller
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("https://gro.dss.vip.ebay.com/nextgro/#/seller/deepdive?deepLinkParams=%7B%22sellerIds%22%3A%5B%22"+EBH_OracleID__c+"%22%5D%2C%22site%22%3A%22"+ IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Ebay') , '%5B0%2C100%5D', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Germany') , '77', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'UK') , '3', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Austria') , '16', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Canada') , '2', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Switzerland') , '193', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Australia') , '15', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Hong Kong') , '201', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Malaysia') , '207', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Singapore') , '216', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Spain') , '186', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'France') , '71', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Ireland') , '', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'India') , '203', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Italy') , '101', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Netherlands') , '146', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Philippines') , '', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Poland') , '', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Belgium (French)') , '23', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Belgium (Dutch)') , '123', IF(ISPICKVAL(EBH_PrimarySite__c , 'Canada (French)') , '210', '%5B0%2C100%5D'))))))))))))))))))))) +"%22%7D", "Click here")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Go to Seller Performance Dashboard for this Seller
CustomField.label: Link to SPD
